alternativeNames: de Morais, Artur Augusto Taborda; Morais, Artur Augusto Taborda de; Moraes, Artur Augusto Taborda de; Taborda de Morais, Artur
examples: Avena barbata subvar. lusitanica Tab.Morais, Bol. Soc. Brot. ser. 2, 13: 624 (1939)
notes: Brummitt and Powell (Authors of Plant Names, 1992) listed the name as ‘Taborda de Morais, Antonio Artur’
source: from J. Paiva 19 Dec. 1990; Memoriam (incl. Biography & Photograph) in: Anuário Soc. Brot. 25: 11-19. 1959, https://digitalis-dsp.uc.pt/botanica/UCFCTbt-E-21-25/UCFCTbt-E-21-25-21a25/UCFCTbt-E-21-25-21a25_item1/P330.html (via Joaquim Santos; COI)
